Imports

spec, config, nimble, git, package, version, thehub, group

Types

Project = ref object
  name*: string
  nimble*: Target
  version*: Version
  dist*: DistMethod
  release*: Release
  dump*: StringTableRef
  config*: NimphConfig
  cfg*: ConfigRef
  mycfg*: ConfigRef
  tags*: GitTagTable
  meta*: NimbleMeta
  url*: Uri
  parent*: Project
  develop*: LinkedSearchResult

ProjectGroup = Group[string, Project]
Dependency = object
  url*: Uri
  operator*: Operator

Releases = TableRef[string, Release]
LinkedSearchResult = ref object
  via: LinkedSearchResult
  source: string
  search: SearchResult

VersionTags = Group[Version, GitThing]
Requirements = OrderedTableRef[Requirement, Requirement]
RequirementsTags = Group[Requirements, GitThing]
